game_meta.title: Minnesota Golden Gophers at Ohio State Buckeyes

weather.notes: Warm, light SE breeze; minimal weather impact

hype_factors: Big Ten matchup with playoff stakes
Minnesota seeks first win in Columbus since 2000
National showcase for elite OSU defense

home.name: Ohio State Buckeyes
motivation_factors: Clean up special teams after Washington

away.name: Minnesota Golden Gophers
away.recent_form: Won 3 of 4; rallied to beat Rutgers
motivation_factors: Prove it game for freshman QB

last_meeting.note: OSU extended streak; series dominated by Buckeyes

matchup_history.recent_trend: Ohio State won 13 straight; Minnesota last won in Columbus in 2000

home.line_movement: moved toward away (less juiced on OSU)

odds.consensus_note: Books align around OSU -23.5; total bet down despite over tickets

key_trends: OSU games 1-3 to the OVER (defense-driven unders)
Minnesota rush D ranks top-5; OSU pass D top-10
situational_spots: Inflated favorite tax on No. 1 in primetime
Market moved total down vs heavy over tickets → potential contrarian under

moneyline.pick: No play (price too steep on OHST; MINN longshot only for parlays)
moneyline.rationale: OSU win likely but -2400 offers no value; plus-money not justified vs No.1 defense

spread.rationale: Number inflated after move; Minnesota’s top-5 rush D and slow OSU pace support dog

total.rationale: OSU No.1 scoring D, Minnesota RB injuries, market move to under despite over tickets

best_bet.rationale: Elite OSU defense + Minnesota shorthanded backfield; market signals agree

injuries_news: Minnesota RB Darius Taylor questionable (hamstring) after missing 2 straight
Minnesota RB A.J. Turner out for season
Ohio State defense allowing 5.5 PPG; red-zone TDs allowed: 0 through Week 5
matchup_notes: OSU pass D top-10; Minnesota run D top-5 → profile favors lower scoring
Minnesota last beat OSU in 2000 (in Columbus)
coaching_notes: OSU DC Matt Patricia in Year 1 with dominant early returns
P.J. Fleck leans on defense and field position as big underdog

excitement_factors.narrative: Giant vs gritty underdog with elite defenses
tv_storylines: Can Minnesota’s front slow OSU run game?

sources.label: DraftKings Sportsbook (via Bleacher Report live odds)
